name: Survivor (itch) (stugray)
description:
A roguelike game, pitting you against an ever increasing amount of undead as you try to stay alive for just one more day.

Made from Unity Tutorial found here
https://unity3d.com/learn/tutorials/projects/2d-roguelike-tutorial

Controls
Arrow keys to move
You can't fight the zombies
You can hack through walls, and it will take you 4 moves.
